hero.description: Visualize your Claude Code sessions in real-time. Track usage, analyze costs, and gain deep insights into your AI development workflow.

features.label: Features
features.title: Everything You Need to Monitor Claude
features.description: Powerful tools to understand, analyze, and optimize your Claude Code usage

realtime.title: Real-time Monitoring
realtime.description: Watch your Claude sessions live with WebSocket-powered updates. See every tool call, message, and response as it happens.

usage.title: Usage Dashboard
usage.description: Track costs, tokens, and session statistics across all your projects. Visualize usage patterns with interactive charts.

analysis.title: Prompt Analysis
analysis.description: AI-powered analysis of your prompts and workflows. Identify patterns, optimize strategies, and improve productivity.

tools.title: Tool Visualization
tools.description: See exactly which tools Claude uses and how. Understand the sequence of operations in every session.

search.title: Session Search
search.description: Find any session instantly with powerful search and filtering. Navigate through your entire Claude history.

i18n.title: Multi-language
i18n.description: Full support for English, Korean, Japanese, and Chinese. Auto-detects your browser language.

cta.title: Start Monitoring Today
cta.description: Download Claude Monitor and take control of your AI development workflow

usage.title: Usage Dashboard
usage.description: Track your Claude Code usage and costs

analysis.title: Prompt Analysis
analysis.description: Analyze your prompt patterns and get improvement suggestions
